description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dm0YMEvSY0qg0jA0]{Gladiator Dedication}

Youâ€™re skilled with flashy weapons. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hMYdSFmMWzidzHih]{Bo Staff}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DA3HgyEBGEbtRNOo]{Dueling Cape} (page 249), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zi9ovfoRp2fMhfpO]{Spiked Chain}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.VitLIpdIAmKlGb7i]{Sword Cane} (page 248), and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.f1gwoTkf3Nn0v3PN]{Whip}.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the weapons listed.
